about_the_game:
游戏QQ群：635563491

（The following content is translated using translation software）

Hello, everyone. The following content is about the current progress and future plans of this game.

If you are interested, we hope you can click to add it to your wishlist. Thank you very much! (This is very important for the game.)

(We will release a playtest once it is further refined.)

The functions that have been completed so far:

  • 12dora can walk around freely within the game frame.

  • The status indicators of 12dora: hunger, mood, health, and sleep.

    • (If 12dora doesn't eat for too long, he/she will collapse on the ground.) (Eating too much or too little will lead to a stomach problem.)

  • 12dora can change suits, and there are many hats and accessories (such as twin tails) to choose from.

  • You can place furniture at will, flip them over, and recycle them.

  • There is a change of time, including day and night.

  • You can earn money and gain followers through live streaming. The popularity of the live broadcast room can be increased through various actions of 12dora.

    • (The higher the popularity, the more gifts you will receive.)

  • There is an online shopping store where you can buy clothes, props, and furniture.

  • Room expansion: You can purchase items from the online shopping props store to add more rooms.

The functions that have not been completed yet:

  • More autonomous behaviors of 12dora (such as climbing stairs, interacting with furniture, etc.).

  • 12dora's soliloquy (with bubbles above the head).

  • The chat content between 12dora and players (players can reply by clicking on keywords or emojis).

  • During live streaming, comments will be received. After clicking on a comment, 12dora will reply, which will affect the popularity of the live broadcast room.

  • Event bells: In the game, various events can be received, such as commercial order requests, audience requests, or receiving mysterious gifts, etc.

    • (Debugging of various in-game values...)

  • A wider variety of furniture: including items for planting, treasure chests, food, etc.

Future Plans:

  • Mini-games

  • Friends: Add more characters and relevant interactions (such as live streaming and playing games together with friends).

  • Video production (Gain more followers based on the quality of the videos. Advertising will reduce the video quality.)

  • Functional clothing: Magic wands, pickaxes, etc. (The details have not been finalized yet.)

  • More content available for live streaming.

  • Achievement events. Is it possible to gain 8 billion followers?

Thank you for reading this far. (I also think it's a bit long.)

Many functions are still under debugging. I hope we can create a somewhat interesting mini-game!

Development Team:

Game Design & Art: 石心心sxx
Programming: 晓Akatsuki
Assistance: 白

游戏QQ群：635563491

（The following content is translated using translation software）

Hello, everyone. The following content is about the current progress and future plans of this game.

If you are interested, we hope you can click to add it to your wishlist. Thank you very much! (This is very important for the game.)

(We will release a playtest once it is further refined.)

The functions that have been completed so far:

  • 12dora can walk around freely within the game frame.

  • The status indicators of 12dora: hunger, mood, health, and sleep.

    • (If 12dora doesn't eat for too long, he/she will collapse on the ground.) (Eating too much or too little will lead to a stomach problem.)

  • 12dora can change suits, and there are many hats and accessories (such as twin tails) to choose from.

  • You can place furniture at will, flip them over, and recycle them.

  • There is a change of time, including day and night.

  • You can earn money and gain followers through live streaming. The popularity of the live broadcast room can be increased through various actions of 12dora.

    • (The higher the popularity, the more gifts you will receive.)

  • There is an online shopping store where you can buy clothes, props, and furniture.

  • Room expansion: You can purchase items from the online shopping props store to add more rooms.

The functions that have not been completed yet:

  • More autonomous behaviors of 12dora (such as climbing stairs, interacting with furniture, etc.).

  • 12dora's soliloquy (with bubbles above the head).

  • The chat content between 12dora and players (players can reply by clicking on keywords or emojis).

  • During live streaming, comments will be received. After clicking on a comment, 12dora will reply, which will affect the popularity of the live broadcast room.

  • Event bells: In the game, various events can be received, such as commercial order requests, audience requests, or receiving mysterious gifts, etc.

    • (Debugging of various in-game values...)

  • A wider variety of furniture: including items for planting, treasure chests, food, etc.

  • Functional clothing: Magic wands, pickaxes, etc. (The details have not been finalized yet.)

  • Achievement events. Is it possible to gain 8 billion followers?

Thank you for reading this far. (I also think it's a bit long.)

Many functions are still under debugging. I hope we can create a somewhat interesting mini-game!

name: Pet Streamer 12dora

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 760(128MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This is a virtual 12dora. You can feed and bathe him to keep him healthy and in a good mood. What should you do when you're short of money? Try starting a live stream and attract viewers by showing various in-game activities. Gain more fans (and more money)!
